Text: Nepotu my good friend thanks for this game and for all of your uploads.And Credits ands a million thanks goes to chris11 and to the other guys that make those games happens.I remember that before some time i ask you if u could find them in HD720p and u truly u and your friends deliver..I love 720p.Trusted scull well deserved.No its time for VIP green scull..lol.So my man u and your great friends keep up the awesome work and keep the fantastic world of NBA rolling.Cheers.:-)
